name: Dice Jumper
description:
My solo project for GMTK 2022 "Roll of the dice". All the assets were made during the jam by me

Simple platformer with procedurally generated endless levels. Pick dices to get some advantages:

Roll green dices to upgrade some of character skills

Roll blue dices to get amazing super-powers

Collect red dices to get a chance to reborn by the saving dice roll

And the most needed dices - golden. Roll the found dice to get the rolled value in your collection. After collecting all 6 values you'll be admitted to the legendary 21-dice, sum of all usual dice values
